pages.text: This ritual can awaken the fire that sleeps within the once depersonalized $(l:plants/nameless_tree)Nameless Tree$(). Strong magic, tainted and twisted by blood and hell, strives to break free from the oblivion of history. The name of the $(l:plants/kramer_tree)tree$(), whose roots once absorbed an ocean of innocent blood spilled by an inquisitor named Kramer, can be restored through the ritual of naming.

pages.annotation_line1: The sapling of the Nameless Tree
